EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations— 

• Amend S. I. 565/2012 by providing for a new offence Regulation 26 and 

penalties Regulation 27. 

• A fixed payment notice and form in respect of specified contraventions 

is also provided. 

• Revoke the Air Pollution Act (Fixed Payment Notice) (Installations and 
Activities Using Organic Solvents) Regulations 2016 (S. I. No. 347 of 
2016).
